name: [EARLY ACCESS] Super Hiro Boy Land
description:
Super Hiro Boy Land is a basic platformer game. 

The Early access give you the access for worlds 1 to 6. The end of the game is in development.

STORY: Hiro, a super boy wakes up in a strange world: Enemies, Wizards, Bosses, ... What does this mean?

Leave a comment to help me with your opinion !
